thread.section_title: Le Relais des Halles - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Room for one more
thread.title_full: Room for one more - Review of Le Relais des Halles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: The L
title: Room for one more
text: Booked into this fantastic hotel on a three night midweek break with my wife and infant son. On arrival we were informed that we been upgraded to a suite. The staff in the hotel Anna and Ansely were extremely helpful. This was a theme that continued throughout out stay., with the breakfast ladies being lovely also. Travelling with a child under one is never easy but staying in a hotel like this certainly makes it a more attractive proposition. Location wise it's fantastic. Very near the train station and within walking distance of the bastille. My wife and I have both agreed we cannot wait to return to this hotel. Just a fantastic experience all round.
